name: Pong (itch) (dragonar25)
description:
Basic simple Pong game - my first attempt at game dev and I enjoyed it. 

The ball is set up to pick up speed as each round goes, so brace up for a laugh with your friends! The ball also reacts to the speed of each player. It is set on a sci-fi theme but kept simple for its retro aspect. I hope you enjoy it! 

My technical goals were to learn the following about the game dev process from start to finish in Unity, a bit of everything: UI, music, sound, animation, movement, code, and packaging. Let me know if you find any bugs or have issues running this on your computer. I know there is more I can learn from this project.

Control:

Player 1 (left) : W and S to move up and down

Player 2 (right): UpArrow and DownArrow to move up and down
